itemDisplayName: Deploy a 15 Node, cross Azure Zone, secure Windows Service Fabric Cluster
description: This template allows you to deploy an secure 15Node, cross AZ Service Fabric Cluster running Windows Server 2019 Datacenter on a Standard_D2_V2 Size VMSS, with network security groups enabled.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a 15 Node, cross Azure Zone Windows Service Fabric Cluster
